P2_JWT_VALIDATION_ERROR.errorMessage: JWT token validation failed due to invalid or expired token

P2_KAFKA_INIT_ERROR.errorMessage: Failed to initialize Kafka producer or consumer

P2_KAFKA_MSG_PROCESS_ERROR.errorMessage: Error while processing a Kafka message

P2_KAFKA_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred during Kafka processing

P2_JSON_PARSING_ERROR.errorMessage: Failed to parse JSON due to invalid syntax or structure

P2_FETCH_ERROR.errorMessage: Error fetching data from the source

P2_DELETE_FAILED.errorMessage: Failed to delete the requested resource

P2_UPDATE_FAILED.errorMessage: Failed to update the requested resource

P2_ERROR_GENERATING_TOKEN.errorMessage: Error occurred while generating authentication token

P2_JSON_PROCESSING_ERROR.errorMessage: Failed to process JSON data correctly

P2_INVALID_FORMAT_ERROR.errorMessage: Input format is invalid or not supported

P2_INVALID_DATE_FORMAT.errorMessage: Provided date format is incorrect or not supported

P2_HTTP_ERROR.errorMessage: An HTTP request error occurred, possibly due to connectivity issues

P2_REQUEST_ERROR.errorMessage: The request is invalid or malformed

P2_QDRANT_CONNECTION_ERROR.errorMessage: Error Connecting to the Qdrant instance
